title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 361-4.7 - Recordkeeping and reporting requirements for registered and permitted mulch processing facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 361-4.7 - Recordkeeping and reporting requirements for registered and permitted mulch processing facilities

State Regulations

The following criteria apply to both registered and
permitted facilities: (a) The facility
must keep records as required by subdivision
360.19
(k) of this

Title. (b) The facility must submit
an annual report as required by paragraph 360.19(k)(3) of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
361-4.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
